version_description: Minor bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes.

This version fixes some bugs and adds these features for those upgrading from V3:

- New, easier-to-use user interface.
- Track net carbs or total carbs.
- Improved search accuracy and speed.
- Quicker food entry. Enter multiple foods in one meal from the same search screen.
- We've consolidated all the food picking options into one simple view.
- New exclusive content, including a low carb blog, discussion boards, and "Ask a Nutritionist" feature.
- You can now add friends and see their daily carb counts -- it's a great motivator!
- Better charts.
- Water tracking, diet analysis, and Apple Health integration are now free.
- Lots of bug fixes and performance improvements.

If you enjoy Carb Manager, please leave a nice review on the store.

Thank you to the Carb Manager community for your support and feedback. We've added these features to version 4.3.0:
- Track total carbs and net carbs.
- Copy meals with one tap.
- New Premium recipes and jump start guide.
- Direct Fitbit integration (Premium).
- Numerous bug fixes and performance improvements.
If you love Carb Manager, please rate us -- it's the #1 thing to help us continue improving this app!

Well, it's getting to be that time of the year again. From that big bowl of Halloween candy in the office break room, to Aunt Ida's fruit cake, to pumpkin-spiced... everything, welcome to fall, a.k.a. "THE SEASON OF CARBS". We won't sugar-coat it: this is can be a tough time for folks in the low carb and keto community. We are here to help! With Carb Manager, keeping count of what are you are (and aren't) eating couldn't be easier. Use our lightening fast search, scan a barcode, or use our futuristic image AI to snap a pic to log. You can even use our revolutionary "say it" feature to voice log your meals.

Cold weather cravings? Search our database of over 350,000 low carb recipes to find delicious alternatives to common carb-loaded treats. We even have a recipe for pumpkin-spiced muffins with only 3g of carbs per serving. (Yes, please.)

This latest release includes lots of performance improvements, all to make tracking your carbs as quick, easy, and fun as possible.

Whether you are Keto, low carb (LCHF), Whole30, counting macros, or anything else, Carb Manager will help you take control of your diet and kick those carbs to the curb. Now is the perfect time to start fresh and join the low carb revolution.

This update includes:
* Carb Manager is now free to use
* iPhone X support
* Glucose and ketone tracking by meals (before, after, and fasting)
* The ability to set different goals on different days (i.e. for carb cycling)
* Per meal goals
* And lots of little improvements based on your awesome feedback

Meet the all-new Carb Manager®, reimagined from the ground up to help you crush your health and fitness goals and live your best life.

Whether you’re Keto, low-carb (LCHF), Whole30, counting macros, or anything else, Carb Manager will help you take control of your diet and kick those carbs to the curb.

With a faster, more intuitive interface, and new features designed to support your low-carb lifestyle, there’s never been a better time to start fresh and join the low carb & Keto revolution.

This update includes:

* A brand new look and feel

* New features like Carb Manager’s Keto Academy, free daily recipes, “Challenge” achievement medals, diet composition visualizer, new Premium content, a new Macros Calculator, and much more.

* Bug fixes

* Improved speed and stability

* And lots of other little tweaks and improvements based on feedback from our customers!
